price: 13. Žmogui bus pranešta Tą Dieną apie tai, ką jis pasiuntė ir užlaikė.
arabic: يُنَبَّؤُاْ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ يَوۡمَئِذِۭ بِمَا قَدَّمَ وَأَخَّرَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: yunabba-u al-insānu yawma-idhin bimā qaddama wa-akhara
